text: (visvasavantayini) numbala aturin vu panividakaruveku numbala veta sæbævinma pæmina æta. (numbalata yam khedavacakayak ætivi) numbala duskaratvayata patvima ohuva vedanavata patkaravayi. ohu numbala kerehi (numbalage visvasaya pilibanda) satutu vanneki. deva visvasavantayin pilibanda senehevanta vu maha karunikaya
